blogs.title: Birdbooker Report 304
blogs.summary:
SUMMARY: Books, books, beautiful books! This is a list of biology, ecology, environment, natural history and animal books that are (or will soon be) available to occupy your bookshelves and your thoughts.

“Words in leather and wood”. Bookshelv

author.name: Maniraptora: Tastes Like Chicken
author.description:
"GrrlScientist" is the blog pseudonym for a female evolutionary
biologist/ornithologist who writes about E 3: evolution,
ecology and ethology, and the subtle relationships between these
phenomena, especially in birds.

blogs.title: New books party: the British Ecological Society edition
blogs.summary: Thanks to the British Ecological Society, I am sharing some scholarly and academic-type books about all sorts of interesting biological topics, including ecological speciation, emerging infections, scientific writing and even a monograph of the domestic ca

author.description: Latest news, comment and analysis from the Guardian, the world’s leading liberal voice

news.title: Un avion qui décolle, c'est un pinson qui arrête de chanter
news.summary: Pour compenser les dommages causés par le vacarme des réacteurs, pinsons, merles ou encore mésanges ont appris à mettre leur réveil un peu plus tôt.
